mapper.update: update tbl_drugs set d_name = #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_manufacture = #{dManufacture,jdbcType=CHAR}, d_quality_guarantee_period = #{dQualityGuaranteePeriod,jdbcType=CHAR}, d_price = #{dPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, d_stock = #{dStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where did = #{did,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select did, d_name, d_manufacture, d_quality_guarantee_period, d_price, d_stock from tbl_drugs

SELECT did, d_name, d_manufacture, d_quality_guarantee_period, d_price, d_stock FROM tbl_drugs
d_name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
AND d_stock>#{stockMin}
AND #{stockMax}>d_stock
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_drugs(did, d_name, d_manufacture, d_quality_guarantee_period, d_price, d_stock) VALUES(#{did},#{dName},#{dManufacture},#{dQualityGuaranteePeriod},#{dPrice},#{dStock})
